documents.document: EARLY NOTICE, Wednesday CANCELLED, Thurs Marginal. Fri planned to fly. Working bees next 3 days prior to competition. All WELCOME,RS
Early notice - MONDAY / TUESDAY CANCELLED. we need to allow the cows to graze the centre grass prior to COMP. RS
Fine with moderate NW forecast, Bookings very light so capacity available. Meet hanger 9ish on. RS
Early notice Saturday. Finally a fine no wind day!!! Busy so Local onsiters setting up from 8, those further just as you arrive. RS
Fine with moderate W forecast, Could be good or we may have to stop due to crosswind, Worth a go. 9am ish on at hanger. RS
Fine day forecast with moderate NW. Good training plus 4000' therms likely. Meet hanger 9ish onwards..RS
EARLY NOTICE. With front forecast Wednesday FLYING CANCELLED. However weather gods looking kind for Thursday->Saturday!!! RS
#gliding Huey answered the call -at least for today - Fine with light northerlies strengthening later in day Meet up at hangar by 0900
#gliding Wet weather , wet field - flying cancelled Anyone with a line to Huey cld maybe put in some good words !!! BWS
Rain, strong winds actual and forecast .. day to catch up with home jobs .. flying cancelled ..RS
Nice Papawai morning. winds increasing this arvo. Meeting hanger from 8.30 ish on.. RS
Headsup - Club class nationals is still a goer. A few more entries or crew would help.Good practice for the CD's. Contact Mark Wilson
Scrappy southerly day. Day on hold to be decided by crew on site if conditions improve. PJ annual so workshop team in action. RS
Early notice ... Wednesday and Thursday cancelled .. gale W forecast. Likely over our current xwind limit. ROLL ON NEW WESTERLY VECTOR.!!!
Fine with increasing NW forecast. We will have a go and early start to try to avoid the xwinds. Meet 8 ish on hanger. RS
And trout fishing lessons from Steve later if the crosswind does get too strong!!! RS
Fine day. NW forecast after lunch. We will give the day a go .. Meet hanger 8.30 ish on. Day course plus training booked. RS
Gale force winds bffetting field and forecast to stay same/get worse ... DAY CANCELLED .. people on field knocking around. RS
Northerlies forecast, Good training day. Byo BBQ into the pot @JRs after flying. Meet hanger 8.30 ish on .. RS
Friday .. flying definitely on .. cows being moved ... Spare capacity if anyone interested .. call Brian ...RS
Saturday 14th flying early notice, Saturday looks on,Byo food/drinks into the pot BBQ planned for after flying @JRs!!! RS
Another fine westerly day forecast. Brian and crew meeting at hanger 9.30 ish for first day discussion. RS
Early notice .. Thursday cancelled .. too much westerly crosswind forecast ... Field jobs or free day!! RS
Day called off due to fcast westerly Xwind & not enough demand to call Towplane,Mark up to fix checkers caravan so field day,RS
20kt westerly wave fcast,Towplane on standby if demand sufficient.No winch 2day,Need 2 know firm demand by 10am to call day,RS
Beautiful Papawai morning ... 28c forecast .. should be a great busy day .. meet 8.30 ish on .. RS https://t.co/7XfR4aHPJf
Early notice for Tuesday. Looks good day with 28c. Busy day booked already so 8.30ish on setup happening. RS
Westerlies forecast and caravan Rocking in the wind so trials cancelled and day on hold & to be decided by on field crew.RS
Fine day, westerlies forecast. Wave expected. Winds expected to increase from mid pm. Early 8.30 ish start RS
Light SW fcast to increase late arvo. Some cloud, thermals to 6000' later. Meet hanger 8.30 ish on .. RS
Currently fine with winds fcast to rise to 25knt westerlies after lunch. We'll have a go and assess as day evolves .RS
Fine with stiff southerly fcast to ease as day goes on. 6000' thermals. Onfield BBQ 6.30pm ish on, all welcome.. RS
#gliding Wed weather looking good for training until afternoon Currently light SW with 6/10s cloud cover Assemble hangar 0930
Early notice 4 Wednesday.Fcast southerly change late arvo. Flying decision made by crew on field with Meet 9am hanger. RS
Early notice .. Flying cancelled tomorrow, Tuesday , day looks absolutely rubbish, Wed??? Thurs/Friday look good !!!! RS
Southerly fcast to ease over the day .. day to be called by the team on the field as conditions evolve. RS
Gale force westerlies forecast. No flying today however usual ground activities happening. RS
Nice day forecast. Meeting at hanger 8.30 ish on .. New Year food/drinks at JRs tonight .. RS
Great thermal day fcast. To 6500' and convergence lines fcast til late. Meet hanger 9ish on. RS
Early Notice .. Thursday forecast looking rubbishy so NO FLYING PLANNED ... RS
Cloud forecast to burn off with 5000' thermals later on. Team slowly setting up from 8 ish on .. RS
Gales forecast. No bookings . DAY ON HOLD .. plenty of jobs to do around field for those interested .. RS
Good boxing day forecast .. 6000' thermals until late. Meet hanger 9ish on.RS
Southerly Storm not forecast to ease until late. Day cancelled. Boxing day looking promising. Have a nice Xmas all!!! RS
Another lovely papawai day .. Good winch training/dg100 conversion day. Thermals expected to 3500. RS
Beautiful day here at papawai. 6000' thermals forecast til late. Summercrew setting up field from 8ish on. RS
Fcast strong westerly. Meet JRs 9.30 for course groundschool. Flying will be decided based on conditions at the time. RS
Westerly f/cast to increase during day. Start of Papawai Marae scholarship course. Locals getting gliders out from 8.30ish. RS
Beautiful wairarapa morning. F/cast 6000' thermals til late. Local crew setting up from 8.30ish on. RS
Forecast boomer.up to 8000' convergences. Summercrew setting up from 9ish on. Free nibbles and drinks after flying 2day. RS
S/be an interesting spring day for summercrew training day. Possible high thermals/wave. Winds f/cast to https://t.co/99yjyQlUF1 hanger 9ish
Early notice. Wednesday Summercrew training day. Solo and Private owner launches possible.. contact bookings
Weather dodgy.All crew released.However G Dales excellent soaring course on at 9am in JRs.Welcome to sit in.If flying 2day will be spontaneo
Morning looks ok. Early start. Hanger doors opened at 8am ish by summercrew. G Dales lecture starts 9am. AGM 6pm. XMAS BBQ 7pm
Forecast OK for flying. Possibly thermals in the cloud breaks. slowly meet at hanger from 9ish onwards. Relaxed day with Graes friends. RS
@glidingwlgtn Remember Club AGM this Saturday 6pm followed by Xmas BBQ 7pm. Also G Dales Soaring lectures Sat or Sun 9am!!!

Our Xmas Midweek only Special Gliding offers on Grabone. Club website https://t.co/O2jij0DdxJ has weekend choices
https://t.co/klei34VvwM
Stunning Papawai early summer Day. S/be good thermals later, 5000+ cloudbase f/cast. Meet hanger 9.30 ish on. RS
Caravan on the field is seriously rocking in the wind!!!! 40knots forecast. A day to watch the rugby and do house chores!!! RS
NW.Could be fantastic or too windy for winch.Towplane option is lined up(thx Craig).Meet hanger 9.30ish on.Plenty happening onsite anyrateRS
Fine day at Papawai. Group bookng this arvo. Launches available . Meet 10 ish on hanger. RS
Fine and westerly wave day!!! Meet 9.00 ish on at GR trailer at Hood, Masterton. A great day beckons.. RS
Fine with NW with wave forecast. Meet 9ish on Papawai for GR derig and move to Hood. Aerotow at Hood this weekend. RS
#gliding Clearing, westerlies developing later Aerotow off Hood cld be poss Meet hangar 0930 for review
#gliding O/Cast with rain F/cast similar Flying cancelled Hoping for better tomorrow !
#gliding Looking a wave day bt heli activity at Hood not suitable training Towing pte owners poss by a/ment with Craig Stobbs 029 277 7300
#gliding Clear with Westerly. Papawai closed due long grass aerotow from Hood from 1030ish No DG twins at moment Meet Aeroclub Hood
#gliding Cloudy & showers F/cast uncertain Flying formally cancelled but field will be manned from 11 and flying poss if weather improves
General consensus is with unstable southerly day is koozed!!! No flying today and hope for improvement tomorrow. RS
#gliding High o/cast light NE F/cast similar cld be good thermals as day develops Final day youth camp ! Meet hangar 0900 cya here
#gliding High o/cast Lt Easterly F/Cast clearing winds light tending north Good training day for Youth gliders! Meet hangar 0900 BBQ 1900
#gliding Broken cloud Lt SW F/Cast clearing A/noon looking v good Winds lt S/SW Assemble hangar 0900 Ops Briefing 0930 cya here
#gliding Clear , light wind F/Cast similar winds tending WNW later Therms convergence wave all poss Hangar briefing 0930 cya here
#gliding O/cast drizzle F/cast rain strengthening SW Flying cancelled Sunday looking good
#gliding Cloudy lt southerly shld clear soon cloud back middayish We'll give it a go Meet hangar 0930
#gliding Clear sky light Easterly F/Cast incr wind backing west cloud dev mid afternoon AM looking good meet hangar by 9:30 cya here
#gliding 8/8ths overcast wind NNE F/Cast wind backing NW rain showers not clearing until late afternoon Flying cancelled Better days coming!
#gliding Lt NE 6/8ths cld F/cast uncertain - We will give it a go Other activities -eg NB wing polishing avail Meet hangar 0930 cya here
#gliding 0730 DST Steady drizzle F/cast the same Flying cancelled Good day to catch up with home chores in prep for summer !
#gliding High o/cast light SE Forecast clearing later Good training weather Meet hangar 0930 Briefing cya here
#gliding Update Numbers pottering will be very few. Slips and pending further heavy rain cld close roads Staying put prob best option:)
#gliding Good weather for ducks and other web footed creatures ! Not for flying or mowing :( Some will be pottering fm 1030
#gliding Due to forecast heavy rain especially in hills, flying cancelled tomorrow Stay dry!
#gliding 0715ish Clear skies winds light variable F/cast the same Lt therms a/noon Great training weather Meet hangar 0900 cya here
#gliding Heads up for Sun Weather allowing we have a busy day and will be aiming for an 0900 meet up for 1st flight 0930 Usual update @ 0730
#gliding Overcast with scat showers F/Cast similar No flying today Tomorrow looking much better :)
#gliding Some cloud high lennies F/cast deteriorates later in day. We'll give it a go - assemble hangar 0900 cya here
#gliding Clear skies gusty WSW F/Cast similar winds easing Therms later Meet hangar from 0800 cya here
Good flying day forecast. Meet at 0930.
#gliding 0730 Clear skies light winds F/cast same wind NW convergences poss afternoon Good looking day Meet hangar 1000 cya here Dress warm
#gliding 0730 Update clear skies lt NE f/cast similar Good training day ! Meet hangar fm 0930 for1000 start dress warm cya here
#gliding Clear skies lite winds bogey field. Assemble 0930 for fence & tree work first assess field for launching 1200 ish cya here
#gliding For those who may have missed y/day update we have cancelled flying today due rain. Tomorrow is another day !
#gliding Flying cancelled for tomorrow - Sunday due excessive surface water on main strip. Weather not looking great either :(
#gliding To enable alternative plans this is early advice that due to wet & cold weather we will not be flying tomorrow - 06 Sat. Stay warm
#gliding Clear with gusty mod westerly F/cast similar We will be flying Meet hangar 0930 cya here
#gliding Clear, light nthly on ground. west higher F/cast increasing cloud & wind afternoon We're flying Meet hangar 0930 cya here
#gliding High winds passing showers Forecast the same Not nice ! Flying cancelled Try again next weekend :)
#gliding Clearing mod nthly F/cast winds picking up later. Shld be flyable until mid , late afternoon Meet hanger fm 0930 for 10ish start
#gliding Gusty SW & cloudy F/cast similar with showers Flying cancelled Will be crew about if yr out this way
